Title: DataSetInspector plugin for Fiddler HTTP Debugger
Description: This is an inspector plugin for the Fiddler HTTP Debugger which shows datasets in a .Net DataGridView control.
HomeWiki:
Inspector plugin for Fiddler to display xml data in a tabular structure, to easily browse the data in both the request and response.
Originally created to inspect xml datasets, but it works for any type of xml.

Download Fiddler at: http://www.fiddler2.com

Update November 2012: Fixed some bugs & made some changes...
